Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Seamstress
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Seamstress and Tailor CNPCs
Important Commands: ask
Seamstresses and tailors supply $(theatre.gamebrief) with clothing. They should be sought out by anyone desiring a change of wardrobe. {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach |
The Tailors are located on the third floor of Castle Marrach. They exclusively provide masculine garments.
The seamstresses are also located on the third floor of Castle Marrach. Seamstresses exclusively provide feminine garments.| Tailors, who provide male garments, and seamstresses, who provide female garments, can sometimes be found wandering $(theatre.gamebrief).}
Type $(udat.chatchar)ASK SEAMSTRESS or $(udat.chatchar)ASK TAILOR to get a list of the clothing they can provide. Type $(udat.chatchar)ASK [SEAMSTRESS OR TAILOR] FOR [ITEM] to request a specific item, i.e. $(udat.chatchar)ASK SEAMSTRESS FOR GOWN or $(udat.chatchar)ASK TAILOR FOR TUNIC {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach |
Guests who have gained the favor of the court are able to locate nicer clothing within the inner bailey.}
See Also: CNPCs
